review: Everything I thought it would be and more!!
author: C. Hamilton

review: The Fire TV Stick worked well, however, because I have basic internet speed, the movies would stop and spool up from time to time.  I did not want to pay double internet price in order to watch the movies.
author: David Eastlake

review: Live streaming local tv would be great.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Love love love my fire stick! & so do my kids.
author: Erika Adams

review: Love the fire TV stick...turns my HDTV into a smart TV.
author: wisconsinmom

review: Wish I would have purchased the Fire TV Stick  sooner.  It was so easy to install and to operate it is also easy.
author: Ron

review: Bought this for use on s non "smart" TV.  Met all of my expectations, highly recommend this device.
author: Amazon Customer
